actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to increase to $50,000 the amount of an award which an agency may determine, without the approval of the Attorney General.

summary.text: Increases from $25,000 to $50,000 the amount of an award which a Federal agency may make, without the approval of the Attorney General, to settle a tort claim against the Government.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to increase to $50,000 the amount of an award which an agency may determine, without the approval of the Attorney General.
